mean_cn: vi. 向…少收钱；  n. 索价低于常价；  vt. 向…少收钱
mean_en: to charge (someone) too little for something :to ask (someone) to pay too little money for something
sentence: The vendor undercharged the customer by 10 yuan, but only realised after he had left.
sentence_trans: 商贩少收了顾客10块钱，但他在顾客离开后才意识到。
word_etyma: under不足、少 ＋ charge充电，费用 → undercharge充电不足；索价低于常价
